recipesJson.name: Strawberry Kiwi Cooler
recipesJson.author: BradH
recipesJson.description: I absolutely CRAVE a cool menthol vape after a meal. I was out and needed to find something that I could SNV. I usually do a banana menthol, or a Thug Juice Clone, but I like to let both of them sit. I figured this would be worth a shot. I thought that this Creme de Menthe was a little risky, but I'm really enjoying this. Please let me know what you think. :)

reviews.text: My first review after making +40 recipes and lurking FINALLY a recipe that has full flavor and satisfies! Well done! I usually make 10ml and move on, going to make a 30ml and let it steep! Great Snv though! I subbed MF mint, ordered INW mint and will report back
